snippet: Mike D’Antoni, who will be the Lakers’ new coach, will face the challenge of learning from mistakes he made in trying to manage stars’ egos while with the Knicks.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Basketball column contends that Los Angeles Lakers incoming coach Mike D'Antoni must prove that he has learned from mistakes he made as coach of New York Knicks; holds that D'Antoni, who clashed with Knicks star Carmelo Anthony, faces similarly large egos with Lakers.
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni, who will be the Lakers’ new coach, will face the challenge of learning from mistakes he made in trying to manage stars’ egos while with the Knicks.

headline.seo: With Lakers, Mike D’Antoni’s Adjustments Must Start From Within
headline.main: D’Antoni Is Not in Phoenix Anymore
headline.print_headline: This Coach’s Adjustments Must Start From Within
